geninfo.para: This TSI applies to all 2007 models listed above with emissions code 0510922.
The PTO hour meter will not accumulate hours and therefore will always read zero hours. This affects all International 2007 emission compliant models with the above listed feature codes.

NOTE:A software update will be available to the dealerships mid-December. Customers will need to schedule a software update with their local International dealer. Once the software has been updated, the hour meter will function properly. Dealers should continue to order the described features with the understanding that the features will not function properly until the software update has been installed. This will ensure the customers/dealers get the appropriate hardware installed on their vehicles. Therefore, when the software update becomes available (revision V83), no further hardware changes will be necessary.
